StuffTheSpire:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
StuffTheSpire:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

StuffTheSpire:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
StuffTheSpire:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
StuffTheSpire:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

StuffTheSpire:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
StuffTheSpire:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

StuffTheSpire:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
StuffTheSpire:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !StuffTheSpire:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

StuffTheSpire:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
StuffTheSpire:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !stuffthespire:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

StuffTheSpire:PlasmaPunch.NAME: Plasma Punch
StuffTheSpire:PlasmaPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !StuffTheSpire:Diminishing! times. Draw 1 card. stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.

StuffTheSpire:PlasmaPulse.NAME: Plasma Pulse
StuffTheSpire:PlasmaPulse.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block !StuffTheSpire:Diminishing! times. Draw 1 card. stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.
